mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 1 THEN '일요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 2 THEN '월요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 3 THEN '화요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 4 THEN '수요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 5 THEN '목요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 6 THEN '금요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 7 THEN '토요일' END AS "day" , ROUND(AVG(PAYMENT_AMOUNT)) AS "paymentAmount" FROM PAYMENT where TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{firstDate} AND #{lastDate} GROUP BY CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 1 THEN '일요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 2 THEN '월요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 3 THEN '화요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 4 THEN '수요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 5 THEN '목요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 6 THEN '금요일' WHEN TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'D') = 7 THEN '토요일' END

SELECT CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID = '0' THEN '비회원' ELSE '회원' END AS "member", SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS "paymentAmount" FROM PAYMENT where TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') GROUP BY CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID = '0' THEN '비회원' ELSE '회원' END
